Text: Dan Brown's material was/is fiction and confusion, and of course popularized by the mass media.  This is the real thing, folks.  Relatively few have really grasped the significance of the fact that there are verifiable mathematical indications related to the Bible's prophetic declarations.  The very fact that this information is available as readily as it is now is because it is by God's grace that the truth of the matter be known before its occurrence.  Understanding that this window of time is prophetically significant is not enough.  While believers (members of the body of Christ) understand the bigger picture, New Agers are looking for their Maitreya avatar world leader, Israel is still waiting for her Messiah, and the globalists are nearing their goal of collapsing all the currencies of the nations thru central banks, forcing the eventual institution of world government.  In the person of the Antichrist will rest the hopes and dreams of unsaved humankind which rejects the guidance of the Holy Spirit of God.  The idol shepherd will at first mimic the unity of the future biblical Millennium but will in the end bring all the confused wisdom of the world's ways to its logical end.
Thanks once again for another exceptional upload.
